description.value:
You infuse the weapon with magic allowing it to safely operate beyond its normal parameters. If the target is a commercial or tactical weapon, it becomes an advanced weapon, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to two.

Heightened (6th) If the target is a commercial, tactical, advanced, or superior weapon, it becomes an elite weapon, gaining a +2 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to three.

Heightened (9th) The target becomes a paragon weapon, gaining a +3 to item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to four.

target.value: 1 weapon that is unattended or wielded by a willing creature
